data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Bournemouth with the kick-off.
Dominic Solanke is on target to give Bournemouth a 0-1 advantage.
In the minute 25, Lloyd Kelly instrumental with a fine assist.
Henrik Dalsgaard (Brentford) levels the match at 1-1 with a header.
That's a fine assist from Mathias Jensen.
In the minute 41, At Brentford Community Stadium, Lewis Cook has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Jarred Gillett blows to end the first-half.
Brentford have kicked-off the second half at Brentford Community Stadium.
In the minute 65, Thomas Frank is making the team's first substitution at Brentford Community Stadium with Tarique Fosu replacing Sergi Canos.
Joshua King is replacing Lewis Cook for the away team.
Tarique Fosu heads in to make it 2-1 at Brentford Community Stadium.
In the minute 79, Great play from Bryan Mbeumo to set up the goal.
The home team replace Joshua Da Silva with Emiliano Marcondes.
Sam Surridge is on a sub for David Brooks for Bournemouth.
In the minute 89, Brentford make their third substitution with Saman Ghoddos replacing Bryan Mbeumo.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
Dan Gosling is replacing Jefferson Lerma for the away team.
